casebody.data:
Woods et al., Appellants, v. Cincinnati Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Woods v. Cincinnati Ins. Co. (1992), 63 Ohio St.3d 639.]

(No. 92-49 Submitted April 8, 1992 Decided May 13, 1992.) Clark, Perdue & Roberts Co., L.P.A., and Glen R. Pritchard, for appellants Nancy Woods and Janine Graves. Lane, Alton & Horst and Karen K. Rosenberg, for appellee.

The motion to certify the record is allowed and the judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on authority of State Farm Auto. Ins. Co. v. Alexander (1992), 62 Ohio St.3d 397, 583 N.E.2d 309.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
